lead_paragraph: PILKONIS--Pamela A.,died peacefully on February 3, 2016. Pam was the beloved daughter of the late Raymond and Julia Pilkonis, sister of Paul (Elaine) and Pat (Robin), aunt to Julia (Ran) and their three children. Pam was raised in Manchester, CT. She graduated from Wellesley College in 1971 and pursued further training in fine arts at Boston University. She spent more than two decades in Provence, France, where she was a sculptor, painter, and educator at the Lacoste School of the Arts. Most recently she lived and worked in New York City. A memorial service celebrating Pam's life will be held at a date to be announced. In lieu of flowers, the family requests donations in Pam's memory be made to: Dr. Anne Moore Research Fund/memo line: Attn: Dr. Linda Vahdat; Mailing address: Dr. Linda Vahdat, 425 East 61st Street, 8th Floor, NY, NY 10065. 1/3
